trans-unit.source: This single-instance application could not connect to the original instance | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 此单实例应用程序无法连接到原始实例 |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: This single-instance application could not connect to the original instance
trans-unit.target: 此单实例应用程序未能连接到原始实例

trans-unit.source: This single-instance application could not connect to the original instance.
trans-unit.target: 此单实例应用程序未能连接到原始实例。

trans-unit.source: Some of the possible causes for this problem are as follows:
trans-unit.target: 一些可能导致此问题的原因包括：

trans-unit.source: The application does not have permissions to create kernel objects.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序没有创建内核对象的权限。

trans-unit.source: For more information about kernel objects, see [Mutexes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9dd06e25-12c0-4a9e-855a-452dc83803e2).
trans-unit.target: 有关内核对象的详细信息，请参阅[互斥锁](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9dd06e25-12c0-4a9e-855a-452dc83803e2)。

trans-unit.source: The base name for the kernel objects comes from concatenating the assembly's GUID, major version number, and minor version number.
trans-unit.target: 内核对象的基名称是通过串联程序集的 GUID、主版本号和次版本号得到的。

trans-unit.source: For example, the base name could be `3639f15d-9547-43da-8145-60da347829915.1`.
To correct this error when developing the application
trans-unit.target: 在开发应用程序时更正此错误

trans-unit.source: Check that the application does not go into an unresponsive state.
trans-unit.target: 检查应用程序未进入未响应状态。

trans-unit.source: Check that the application has sufficient permissions to create kernel objects.
trans-unit.target: 检查应用程序是否具有创建内核对象的足够权限。

trans-unit.source: Restart the original instance of the application.
trans-unit.target: 重启应用程序的原始实例。

trans-unit.source: Restart the computer to clear any process that may be using the resource that is required to connect to the original instance application.
trans-unit.target: 重启计算机，以清除可能正在使用连接到原始实例应用程序所需资源的任何进程。

trans-unit.source: Note the circumstances under which the error occurred, and telephone Microsoft Product Support Services.
trans-unit.target: 记录发生错误的环境，并与 Microsoft 产品支持服务联系。

trans-unit.source: [NIB: How to: Specify Instancing Behavior for an Application (Visual Basic)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/48539ad8-d960-4210-beab-ee65f6c6dc6e)
trans-unit.target: [NIB︰ 如何︰ 指定应用程序 (Visual Basic 中) 的实例化行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/48539ad8-d960-4210-beab-ee65f6c6dc6e)
